name: Major Blink
overview: A one player arcade style game by Jon Williams & Dávid Vigh, released to PD in 2020. This was the second game in the Berks trilogy, released originally in 1985 for the Vic20 and converted to C64 by Digital Monastery. A cross between a painter program where you have to pass by sections of the gamescreen to lock them in and with shooter elements.
